id.description: The user's unique user id, which never changes

name.description: The user's current username (which can change over time)

country.description: The country the player asserts they're from

member_since.description: The date the account was created

tagline.description: The user's tagline. Can be Markdown encoded and a maximum of 255 UTF-8-encoded bytes.

name_history.description: The history of this player's aliases

links.title: Messages To
links.description: (Authentication required) Collection of private messages you have sent to that player (based on what you've saved in *your* mailbox, not what's in the receiver's box).

links.title: Current Games
links.description: Collection of all the games this player is currently participating in

links.title: Past Games
links.description: Collection of archived games this player has participated in

links.title: Statistics
links.description: The leaderboard stats for this player

links.title: Clients
links.description: Any clients owned by this player

links.title: AIs
links.description: Any AIs owned by this player
